summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the sale of City real property; authorizing the sale of the land and house at 1354 31st Avenue South by public bid; authorizing execution of a Quit Claim Deed to the property; authorizing use of sale proceeds to pay obligations owing to the State of Washington for property acquisition and to pay costs of sale; increasing an appropriation for the Office of Housing in the 2003 Budget; and ratifying and confirming prior actions, all by a vote of three-fourths of the members of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Community Development
